notes.title: Informed Consent Statement
notes.p: The TCGA data were obtained through an approved data access application from the database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGAP Project ID 13801 last renewed on 6 April 2020). For information about the TCGA informed consent process, see https://www.cancer.gov/about-nci/organization/ccg/research/structural-genomics/tcga/history/policies/suggested-prospective-informed-consent.pdf.
